articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Blames U.S. for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Blames U.S. for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Thursday released a statement hitting out at the U.S. for its foolish attempt to shift the blame for the escalated tension on the Korean peninsula on to the DPRK.
					 The U.S. is describing the just self-defensive countermeasures taken by the DPRK to cope with the former's frantic war moves and its sanctions and racket to stifle the latter as a "provocation" and "threat" and creating  impression that the latter was to blame for the above-said tension. This is profound confusing of right and wrong.
					
					 The statement noted that the prevailing grave situation was entirely attributable to the U.S. It went on:
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail are neither temporary ones started recently nor an abstract conception but a potential threat it has posed to the DPRK every day for the past several decades after adopting the preemptive nuclear attack on it as a policy.
					
					 The U.S. attempted to mount a nuclear attack on the DPRK as early as in the 1950s and the Bush administration officially listed the DPRK, which was a non-nuclear state, as part of "the axis of evil" and target of preemptive nuclear attack early in the 21st century.
					
					 The Obama administration excluded the DPRK from the list of the "nuclear non-use" in April of 2010, fully revealing its scenario for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK. The U.S. is reiterating it still now.
					
					 It has staged large-scale joint military drills every year and made practical preparations for a nuclear attack on the DPRK by mobilizing various type nuclear war hardware.
					
					 The on-going Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises, in particular, are unprecedented in their scale and provocative nature.
					
					 While threatening the DPRK with nukes, the U.S. is resorting to an extreme political and economic pressure on the former.
					
					 Lording it over the UN and the international community, the U.S. is recklessly working to stifle a sovereign state at any cost with every conceivable illegal and brigandish means and methods employed. This can never be tolerated.
					
					 Now that it is as clear as noonday the U.S. military threats and hostile acts against the DPRK are designed to decapitate the supreme leadership and bring down the "social system" of the DPRK, it is left with no option but to take actions to protect the dignity of its supreme leadership, sovereignty and right to existence.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail, joint military exercises, sanctions and other moves to stifle the DPRK are the root cause of pushing the situation on the peninsula to the brink of a clash of nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to shift the blame for the escalating tension on to the DPRK by triggering off its resistance through diverse pressure but it brings into bolder relief the true colors of the former as an aggressor and provocateur.
					
					 If the U.S. tries to infringe upon the supreme interests and sovereignty of the DPRK even a bit, the latter will mete out a prompt merciless punishment to it with all means including nuclear force involved and defuse the threats to its sovereignty and regional peace and security, declares the statement.

articles.title: Premier Makes Field Survey of Factories
articles.content:
Premier Makes Field Survey of Factories
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Haeju Tractor Accessory Parts Factory and the Haeju Trailing Farm Machine Factory.
					 He learned in detail about the technical character, material consumption and test operation of various farm machines and discussed the measures for perfecting farm machines to be convenient for use by farmers.
					
					 He underscored the need to put spurs to the farm machine production and give a priority to producing equipment necessary for immediate farming preparations. He also called on relevant fields to provide electricity and materials in a responsible way to the units producing tractor accessory parts and trailing farm machines.
					
					 He also went round the Omgot Co-op Farm in Anak County and took necessary measures after learning about farming preparations.

articles.title: Dam Project of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 Completed
articles.content:
Dam Project of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 Completed
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Members of the youth shock brigade of the DPRK finished the dam project of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 on Thursday.
					 Members of the shock brigade and other builders vied with each other to mount the dam to greet the historic moment of the completion of the dam project.
					
					 At 10 a.m. they made a report on the completion of the dam project to supreme leader Kim Jong Un, looking up to the sky above Pyongyang.
					
					 The project started on January 13.
					
					 The completion of the dam project in a matter of less than three months represents a heroic epic which could be created only by the heroes of the youth power who grew up under the care of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and a miracle they worked as young people of heroic Korea by bringing about a great leap forward by doing 10 years' work just in one year.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Achievements Made in DPRK
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Achievements Made in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has accomplished 10 projects in a little more than one month after the start of the 70-day campaign.
					 Among them are an axial snow blower with low noise, which can be used under any circumstances, and different kinds of ultra-modern analyzers.
					
					 The academy established a process of concentrating magnesite on the basis of optical sorter at the Ryongyang Mine and fully restored the reactive power compensation system at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex.
					
					 And it set up a process of producing powder of Grifola frondosa, a food addictive for raising the survival rate of fries up to nearly 100 percent and weight of catfish 1.4 times, at the Pyongyang Catfish Farm.
					
					 Researchers of the academy also developed a mobile wrestling adjudicator and an electronic refereeing device for weightlifting.
					
					 Meanwhile, scores of research projects are pushed forward at 70 percent stage.

articles.title: Plate Feed Chute Installed at Unryul Mine of DPRK
articles.content:
Plate Feed Chute Installed at Unryul Mine of DPRK
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Unryul Mine, a leading iron ore producer in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, has recently installed a plate feed chute for the 2,200-hp stripping equipment to remove earth.
					The installation of the feed chute made it possible to raise the stripping handling capability five times while saving 570,000 kwh of electricity annually as well as much manpower, fuel and tires.
					
					 Kang Kil Yong, manager of the mine, told KCNA that all its employees keenly realized through the manufacturing of feed chute by their own efforts that the spirit of self-development is what keeps them alive.
					
					 The long-distance belt conveyor for earth-scrapping at the mine was built in June Juche 64 (1975) on the initiative of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Only Curse and Death Await Park Geun Hye: Choson Sinbo
articles.content:
Only Curse and Death Await Park Geun Hye: Choson Sinbo
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Choson Sinbo, organ of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, carried an article disclosing the cunning plot of the Park Geun Hye group to prolong the conservative regime.
					 Not content with freezing the north-south relations, Park Geun Hye is unhesitatingly escalating provocations and confrontation to drive the destiny of the nation into a nuclear disaster and this is a revelation of the attempt to use the general election to be held on April 13 for prolonging her remaining days and realize the ambition for long-term office, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Curse and death only await Park Geun Hye.
					
					 She set it as the goal of her whole career to "restore the honor" of her father and has revived "yusin" dictatorship. However, she may meet the same miserable end as that of her father Park Chung-Hee who was shot to death by his confidant.
					
					 She will bring nothing but a war to the south Korean people and all other Koreans as she leaves no extreme means untried to gratify her greed for power.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Reckless Moves to Ignite War against DPRK Denounced by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Reckless Moves to Ignite War against DPRK Denounced by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan released a statement on March 28.
					 The statement said that all Koreans in the north, south and abroad have become more vocal denouncing the Park Geun Hye regime for committing thrice-cursed crimes against the country and the nation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The dark clouds of a nuclear war are hanging over the Korean peninsula due to the south Korean treacherous regime busy staging saber-rattling against the north in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 All members of the United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan will turn out as one in the struggle for entombing the Park Geun Hye regime bringing unprecedented misfortunes and sacrifices to the Korean nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces Authorities for Backing Japan's Reinvasion
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces Authorities for Backing Japan's Reinvasion
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea staged an action in Taejon on March 28 in protest against the puppet authorities' act of backing Japan's moves to realize its ambition for reinvasion.
					 The organization noted that the drill for "search and rescue" now under discussion between south Korea and Japan clearly reveals aggressive nature. 
					
					 Voices were heard from the military that Japan should take part in the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills, it said, adding that this is a treacherous remark that the regime itself will allow Japan's reinvasion.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Brand "Agreement" on Issue of Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army as Totally Invalid
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Brand "Agreement" on Issue of Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army as Totally Invalid
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The "national action for the nullification of the south Korea-Japan agreement on the comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army and its just settlement in south Korea" held a press conference on March 29.
					 The organization re-clarified that the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is completely invalid as it does not meet the demands of the victims and standard of the international human rights.
					
					 It urged Japan to admit the forcible drafting of the sexual slaves and redress its past crimes through apology and legal reparation.
					
					 On the same day, the Bar Association for Democratic Society of south Korea conducted legal activities claiming the illegality of the "agreement."

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in France
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in France
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in France on March 22.
					 Guy Dupre, president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "For Carrying Forward and Accomplishing the Socialist Cause" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on March 23.
					 The work, published on March 13, Juche 81 (1992) and January 20 and March 3, 1993, says socialism of our country is the genuine people's society and that it is necessary to be faithful to the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Il in order to protect our socialism and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Personages of Myanmar Praise Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Personages of Myanmar Praise Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar made public statements on March 22 and 23 to mark President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary.
					 Tha Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said that Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, is highly praised by progressive mankind as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea, providing the great guiding idea for carrying out the cause of independence, the secretary noted, and went on:
					
					 He will be alive forever in the hearts of the progressives as he ushered in the era of independence and devoted his whole life to the victorious advance of the cause of human independence.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, praised Kim Il Sung as the great leader of the Korean people and world progressives, who made great contribution to freedom and independence of Korea, people's happiness, country's prosperity and global independence, adding: His idea and exploits will shine forever.

articles.title: Int'l Body Slams U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Int'l Body Slams U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The World Peace Council strongly condemns the U.S.-south Korea Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military maneuvers.
					 It said this in a statement on March 19.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The joint military exercises are aggravating the tension on the Korean peninsula and threatening peace and security in the region.
					
					 The largest-ever joint military rehearsals involving huge armed forces followed the cooking up of a new UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 The UNSC's "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK are wrecking peace on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies are trying to topple the DPRK's social system by force.
					
					 This is a component of the U.S. strategy to dominate Asia and a move for invading the sovereign state.
					
					 The World Peace Council has been consistent in demanding the conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. and the U.S. forces' withdrawal from south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is the only country that used nuclear bombs, has the biggest nuclear arsenal in the world and has deployed its nuclear weapons in other countries.
					
					 The World Peace Council supports Korea's peaceful reunification and extends firm solidarity to the Korean people's struggle for rejecting the imperialists' interference and hegemonism and preserving the right to decide their own fate.

articles.title: Czech Media Demand U.S. Heed DPRK's Warnings
articles.content:
Czech Media Demand U.S. Heed DPRK's Warnings
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- An article titled "DPRK declares nuclear preemptive attack on U.S. in case of slight provocation" was posted on the Czech internet paper Prostejopska Pravda on March 27. It was illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un who climbed Mt. Paektu together with the members of KPA fighter pilots' group for touring the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 The article said:
					
					 The showdown between the DPRK and the U.S. drawing the attention of the world public has lasted for several decades.
					
					 The U.S. always sustained setbacks by wrongly provoking the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK declared that it will launch a preemptive nuclear attack upon the U.S. if the latter shows any sign of provocation.
					
					 The imperialist forces will never evade the miserable and catastrophic fate if they attempt an attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is totally different from Iraq and Libya.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind a warning of the DPRK that the U.S. will face its final ruin on its mainland.
					
					 Whether the U.S. exists on the earth or not is up to itself.
					
					 The paper carried an article titled "Bomb-like declaration that will force the U.S. to sustain unheard-of terror and defeat" with a video clip showing the U.S. shameful history in confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 A similar article and video were seen on the website of the Czech branch of the Korean Friendship Association on the same day.

articles.title: British Organizations Support CPRK's Crucial Report
articles.content:
British Organizations Support CPRK's Crucial Report
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK on March 23 made public a joint statement in support of the crucial support of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK).
					 The reckless military provocations of the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea against the DPRK have passed the red line, the joint statement said.
					
					 This is a terrific provocation against the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership and an unpardonable thrice-cursed confrontation racket.
					
					 All the revolutionary armed forces including the Korean People's Army, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards and the people of the DPRK are determined to make retaliation of justice for wiping out the U.S. imperialists and Park Geun Hye group of traitors.
					
					 They would be well advised to stop acting rashly.

articles.title: Portavoz de cancilleria denuncia a Estados Unidos
articles.content:
Portavoz de cancilleria denuncia a Estados Unidos
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que los Estados Unidos trata de imputar estupidamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la responsabilidad del empeoramiento de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores hizo publica el dia 31 una declaracion que senala en particular:
					EE.UU. describe como "provocacion" y "amenaza" nuestras justas medidas autodefensivas tomadas frente a las perversas maquinaciones de guerra de agresion y los alborotos de sancion y de aplastamiento y tergiversa la realidad como si la RPDC fuera culpable de la tension de situacion en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La rigurosa situacion de hoy fue engendrada de punta a cabo por el pais norteamericano.
					
					El chantaje y la amenaza nucleares de EE.UU. no son un fenomeno temporal comenzado recientemente o una concepcion abstracta, sino la realidad impuesta cada dia durante decenios por el pais norteamericano que politizo el ataque nuclear sorpresivo contra la RPDC. 
					
					Ya desde la decada de los 50 del siglo pasado, EE.UU planeo el ataque nuclear contra la RPDC y, a principio de nuevo siglo, la administracion de Bush definio oficialmente a ella, que fue un pais desnuclearizado en aquel entonces, como "eje de mal" y blanco de ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					Tambien, la administracion de Obama mostro abiertamente el intento de ataque sorpresivo nuclear contra la RPDC al excluirla en abril de 2010 de la lista de los objetos de no uso de armas nucleares y hasta fecha lo afirma oficialmente en todas las ocasiones.
					
					EE.UU. realizo cada ano los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura y ha venido preparando practicamente el ataque nuclear contra la RPDC movilizando los pertrechos nucleares de diversos tipos.
					
					En particular, los simulacros conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16 que el efectua este ano son los entrenamientos sin precedentes tanto en su dimension como en su caracter provocativo. 
					
					EE.UU. ejerce la amenaza nuclear sobre la RPDC, y al mismo tiempo, recurre a la extremada presion politica y economica contra ella.
					
					Son intolerables las maniobras imprudentes de EE.UU. que  al actuar como caudillo de la ONU y de la sociedad internacional trata de asfixiar a toda costa al Estado soberano valiendose de los medios y metodos ilicitos y gangsteriles. 
					
					Puesto que es evidente que la amenaza militar y otras acciones hostiles del imperio americano tienen como objeto la eliminacion de la Suprema Direccion de la revolucion coreana y el "derrocamiento del regimen" de la RPDC, nos vemos obligados a arrostrarnos para defender la maxima dignidad sagrada, la soberania y el derecho a la subsistencia. 
					
					La amenaza y chantaje nucleares, los ejercicios belicos conjuntos y las maquinaciones de sanciones y aplastamiento de EE.UU. contra la RPDC son precisamente la causa raigal que llevo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a la extremada fase en que pueda estallar una guerra nuclear. 
					
					Cuanto mas EE.UU. se desespere por imputarle a la RPDC la culpabilidad de la agravacion de la tension provocando su repulsion mediante la presion multilateral, tanto mas se revelara su naturaleza del agresor y provocador. 
					
					En el caso de que EE.UU. trata de atentar aun en lo minimo los supremos intereses y la soberania de la RPDC, le asestaremos de inmediato un castigo implacable movilizando todos los medios incluso las fuerzas armadas nucleares y eliminaremos de raiz la amenaza de la soberania de la RPDC y la paz y seguridad de la region.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju visita fabricas de accesorios de tractor y maquinas agricolas de remolque
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju visita fabricas de accesorios de tractor y maquinas agricolas de remolque
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju visito la Fabrica de Accesorios de Tractor de Haeju y la Fabrica de Maquinas Agricolas de Remolque de Haeju.
					El hizo conocimiento detallado de las caracteristicas tecnicas y la cantidad de consumo de materiales de diversas maquinas agricolas y del estado de manejo de prueba de estas.
					
					Discutio las medidas para perfeccionarlas mas para que los granjeros las usen mas comodos.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de dar mas acicate a la produccion de maquinas agricolas y elaborar de manera prioritaria los equipos necesarios a los preparativos agricolas inmediatos.
					
					Ademas hizo que las unidades vinculadas suministren con responsabilidad la electricidad y los materiales a las unidades de produccion de accesorios y maquinas agricolas de remolque.
					
					Por otra parte, el premier recorrio la Granja Cooperativa de Omgot del distrito de Anak donde se entero del estado de preparativos agricolas y tomo las medidas necesarias.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena sofisteria de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena sofisteria de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- En el supuesto "acto por dia de defensa del Mar Oeste" organizado hace unos dias en Taejon, Park Geun-hye disparateo ante caudillos de la capa militar y la chusma que "no pueden tolerar mas el desarrollo nuclear y la provocacion del Norte" y "debido al fortalecimiento acelerado de la capacidad nuclear del Norte, sera irreparable la calamidad y paralizada la economia".
					Especialmente, la publicidad de la ojiva nuclear disenada y fabricada por cuenta propia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea significa la "declaracion de hasta el ataque nuclear" contra el Sur de Corea y Estados Unidos, dijo asi e instigo a la confrontacion fratricida abogando por el supuesto "patriotismo".
					
					Esto demuestra claramente el ultimo coletazo de la traidora por liberarse del abismo de bancarrota.
					
					Senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. es el pais criminal que uso unicamente la bomba nuclear en el mundo y amenaza a otros paises y naciones con las armas nucleares.
					
					Nuestro disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa deviene el remedio omnipotente de justicia que defiende firmemente el destino del pais y la nacion desde las crecientes maniobras de aplastamiento nuclear anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Si no lo hubieramos fortalecido superando todas las pruebas, la nacion coreana habria sido ya antes victima de la atroz politica hostil anti- RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Sin embargo, la traidora Park Geun-hye que ha cometido los crimenes imperdonables en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas, censura absurdamente el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC centuplicaran el grado de la ofensiva super-intransigente hasta que se autodestruya la banda traidora de Park.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena intento de Japon para negar historia criminal
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena intento de Japon para negar historia criminal
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el Ministerio de Educacion, Cultura, Deporte, Ciencia y Tecnologia de Japon anoto descaradamente como "su territorio jurisdiccional" el islote Tok en los 8 de los diez manuales para la escuela superior que seran utilizados desde la primavera del ano proximo. Ademas, en ellos se ven abiertamente hasta el contenido que niega los crimenes de esclavitud sexual para el ejercito japones cometidos por los imperialistas japoneses en el pasado.
					En un comentario individual del dia 30, el rotativo Minju Joson condena que este hecho muestra el cinismo de los reaccionarios japoneses que se valen de todas las artimanas para negar a toda costa la historia criminal.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses plantean embellecer su historia de agresion llena de asesinatos, saqueos y crimenes horribles e inyectarla a los miembros de la nueva generacion, subraya el articulo y prosigue:
					
					Ahora, los reaccionarios japoneses no abandonan todavia la ambicion absurda de realizar a toda costa el viejo sueno sobre la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental".
					
					Para este fin, ellos visitan a porfia el santuario Yasukuni para encomiar como "patriotas" a los caidos en la agresion continental a pesar de la unanime protesta y condena del pueblo coreano y la sociedad internacional y resucitan el militarismo en todo el territorio japones mediante los ejercicios militares conjuntos con EE.UU.
					
					Es muy facil adivinar el camino a seguir por los alumnos japoneses empapados por la idea militarista.
					
					Pero, los reaccionarios japoneses deben conocer correctamente.
					
					No habra el futuro del pais isleno si los reaccionarios japoneses siembran a los miembros de la nueva generacion la erronea concepcion de historia.
